scripts.test:allure: npm run clean:allure && playwright test && npm run allure:generate

scripts.test:shop:allure:firefox: npm run clean:allure && BROWSER=firefox playwright test --grep @shop && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:shop:allure:headed: npm run clean:allure && playwright test --grep @shop --headed && npm run allure:generate
